availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Woodruff (Harrison County, physician, veteran of the war of 1812)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, soldier and physician. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Stranghan Woodruff in Madison County, Kentucky, on July 19, 1814. Served in Captain Dejarnett's Company of the Kentucky Militia in the War of 1812 from March 29, 1813, to September 28, 1813. Physician in Harrison County in 1850. Physician in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 60A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 613.
U.S. War of 1812 Pension Application Files Index, 1812-1815, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series M313, Kentucky, Certificate #W.0.1348.
